co.cask.coopr.store.provisioner

Interface PluginStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalFilePluginStore

    public interface PluginStore
    Persistent store for plugin data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteResource(Account account, ResourceType type, String name, int version)
      Delete a plugin resource.
      InputStream getResourceInputStream(Account account, ResourceType type, String name, int version)
      Get an input stream for reading a plugin resource.

      Initialize the store.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Configuration conf)
        Initialize the store. Guaranteed to be called once before any other calls are made.
        Parameters:
        conf - Configuration for initializing the store

      • getResourceOutputStream

        OutputStream getResourceOutputStream(Account account,
                                   ResourceType type,
                                   String name,
                                   int version)
                                     throws IOException
        Get an output stream for writing a plugin resource.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that owns the plugin resource
        type - Type of resource being written
        name - Name of the resource being written
        version - Version of the resource being written
        Returns:
        Output stream for writing the plugin module
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error getting the output stream

      • getResourceInputStream

        InputStream getResourceInputStream(Account account,
                                 ResourceType type,
                                 String name,
                                 int version)
                                   throws IOException
        Get an input stream for reading a plugin resource.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that owns the plugin resource
        type - Type of resource to get
        name - Name of the resource to get
        version - Version of the resource to get
        Returns:
        Input stream for reading the plugin resource, or null if there is no resource
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error getting the input stream

      • deleteResource

        void deleteResource(Account account,
                  ResourceType type,
                  String name,
                  int version)
                    throws IOException
        Delete a plugin resource.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that owns the plugin resource
        type - Type of resource to delete
        name - Name of the resource to delete
        version - Version of the resource to delete
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error deleting the resource
